name: Number Party
description:
Number Party is a small game made in a couple of days to play with your friends. Guess a number from a certain range and see who the winner is!

Setup

Enter the amount of players playing the game after clicking Play

Enter the random range after clicking Settings

Play

Type in a number for each player and submit

*Once your number is submitted, you will no longer be able to pick that number again for any other player
